titleStmt.title: The Independents catechisme. Or Some observations gathered out of Doctor Bastvvicke his religious and learned treatise entituled Independency not Gods ordinance. For the use of all poor ignorant, wavering, and seduced independents. By John Bernard philopresbytes.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, John.
Bastwick, John, 1593-1654. Independency not Gods ordinance.

notesStmt.note: Based on: Bastwick, John. Independency not Gods ordinance.
The word "philopresbytes" in title is in Greek characters.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library (Early English Books) and the British Library (Thomason Tacts).
